title: The Darkness II v1.1 (working online)
description:
============================================================================================
The Darkness II v1.1 working online!
============================================================================================

English/Spanish


============================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
============================================================================================

- Custom installer compressed.
- The game is updated to the latest version (1.1).
- Audio and texts in two different languages. 
- Online multiplayer works using Steam.
- You can save your progress.
- The libraries the game requires are also included.


============================================================================================
Instructions:
============================================================================================

1. Mount or unzip the .iso file.
2. Run setup.exe file to install the game.
3. Use the shortcut the installer places at the desktop.


============================================================================================
FAQ:
============================================================================================

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, it does.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: Yes, Steam must be running, but the game has to be run from the game's exe file (use the shortcut).

Q: Can I save the game?
A: Yes, you can.

Q: Does it work under Windows 8.1?
A: Yes, it does. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation.


============================================================================================
Special thanks to:
============================================================================================

Voksi Bulgarian and Revolt
